info.name: [Latest]QuantAi Complete API
info.description: Complete API collection for QuantAi - Users, Projects, Survey, and Wallets

query.description: Filter by profile type: AU (Audience), AD (Admin), CL (Client)
Filter by verification status: true or false

formdata.value: This survey has reached its quota.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Customer Satisfaction Survey - Updated",
  "description": "Updated description",
  "language_ids": [1],
  "active": true,
  "start_time": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
  "end_time": "2025-12-31T23:59:59Z",
  "reward_points": 150.0,
  "code": "CSAT-2025-01",
  "project_type": "SU",
  "mode": "PR",
  "participant_limit": 50000,
  "quotafull_message": "Survey is full! We've hit our 50K limit.",
  "terminate_message": "Survey closed early due to sufficient responses."
}

{
  "project": {{project_id}},
  "variable_name": "satisfaction_rating",
  "title": "How satisfied are you with our service?",
  "description": "Please rate your overall satisfaction",
  "is_required": true,
  "is_initial_question": true,
  "display_index": 1,
  "question_type": "rating",
  "widget": "star_rating"
}

{
  "project": {{project_id}},
  "variable_name": "satisfaction_rating",
  "title": "How satisfied are you with our service? (Updated)",
  "description": "Please rate your overall satisfaction",
  "is_required": true,
  "is_initial_question": true,
  "display_index": 1,
  "question_type": "rating",
  "widget": "star_rating"
}
